reviews.title: Fun! But...
reviews.comment: This is my favourite game so far!  But it has a tendency to freeze on the COM2US screen when I go to open it.
reviews.author: Robin Hadley

reviews.title: Sweet Game!
reviews.comment: This game is awesome. The graphics are good, the music isn\'t too obnoxious, and there are many fun features that you can use.
reviews.author: Mila Trampe

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: I love this game but sometimes it forces close by itself, pls fix it, otherwise i would hve rated it 5 star. Anyway, it still fun and cute to play..
reviews.author: Luccinda Steven

reviews.title: Best style game
reviews.comment: This is probably one of the best fashion game I have ever played this game is a perfect game if you like fashion \342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205
reviews.author: Beatrice Polimeni

reviews.title: Good, but could be better
reviews.comment: Nice game, fun, cute, etc. However, it still takes forever to refill your energy...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lotsa of fun, creative
reviews.comment: Lots to do, very creative and cute outfits
reviews.author: Nanhee Cha

reviews.title: Style Starlet
reviews.comment: Fun, cool game where I can express my fun, fresh, and.unique style.
reviews.author: Samantha Chavez

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love it so much! the graphics are so nice and its really fun! Another great game by Com2Us!
reviews.author: Izzi Y

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Its a very cool and interesting game it reminds me of Stardom
reviews.author: Anna Bell Smith

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It would be cool if u could date girls as well bc not everyone is straight but i like boys some of them r ugly though in this game but it is a good game also if u could have friends in this game.
reviews.author: Nat Poli

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on my phone..
reviews.comment: When ever I try to open the app.. it says download failed even though I\'m connected in the net. When the download is like 40% it stays in 40% no matter how many times I try. I\'m just dissapointed :\'((( cause I really want to play the game.
reviews.author: Maxinne Tan

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Love this game!! Though I have a hard time when it comes to energy :) I wish I can get more of that.hihi :3 keep up!!:D
reviews.author: joey navarroza

reviews.title: Very cute
reviews.comment: It is a very cute game but the bfs need more actions like buying clothes&hairstyles for them and special jobs when the relationship is high and introduce more styles of clothes I.e. lolita, punk, etc. And maybe even costumes/cosplays!
reviews.author: Johnelle Molsey

reviews.title: So fun!
reviews.comment: This game is such a blast I love how chic the cloths look and how everyone can be a model. The only issue I have is with how long it takes energy to recharge
reviews.author: Caitlin Hatch

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: I love this game I have the Motorola xoom , it is a few years old and it works great, this app is so fun it has never frozen or anything yet love love love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!;) :) +-+
reviews.author: Taylorp Darson

reviews.title: Its a nice game although more exciting features would make it better.
reviews.comment: More exciting features would be nicer. Still a five star though
reviews.author: Isira Scarlet

reviews.title: Best come 2 us game
reviews.comment: This is my favorite game the company has made, and it\'s better then witch wars! Keep up the work guys :)
reviews.author: jada peterkin

reviews.title: Download failed
reviews.comment: OK so recently I installed this game but after a few seconds it says download failed then i uuninstalled and reinstalled this is the same issue so is it a bug or what?
reviews.author: kasella reeaf

reviews.comment: More instructions
reviews.author: Marcy Kerchal

reviews.title: So fun
reviews.comment: IT really is fun,  but as everyone else says energy regeneration can be frustrating. Good game to play in short bursts
reviews.author: Erin Hatch
